summary: A must have mod for Vampire lovers, this mod not only enlarges the wings of Vampire Lords, but  fixes the ridiculous leg clipping when the wings flap as a bonus!!!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=5][b][center]﻿﻿
[ [ [Mod Author [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/20882614]Rougeshot[/url]﻿ ] ] ][/center][/b][/size][/color]

[color=#d9ead3][size=4][b]Hello fellow modders, I'm Rougeshot and I'm open to[/b][b] any feedback or[/b][b] constructive criticism you may have, but keep in mind that I have a full time career and am in college part time, so it may be a while before I can respond to any comments or questions you may have.  Please be patient with any questions or concerns and I will respond as soon as I am able. 

[/b][/size][/color][b][size=4][color=#d9ead3]﻿And if you enjoy the mod hit that [/color][color=#00ff00]thumbs up[/color][color=#d9ead3] button so that your fellow modders will have an easier time finding this mod among the thousands of others.
[/color][/size][/b][b]
[/b][center][b][color=#00ff00][size=4]Thank you so much for your support.[/size][/color][/b][size=4]﻿


[/size]
[color=#ffff00][size=6][b]Coming Soon to Special Edition!!![/b][/size][/color][/center]


[b][color=#00ffff][size=6][center][ [ [ MOD DESCRIPTION] ] ][/center][/size][/color][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]If your like me and have been disappointed with the vanilla Vampire Lords, then this mod is for you. This mod replaces the vanilla skeleton with a custom skeleton that increases the wing size of vanilla Vampire Lords, as an added bonus this mod also fixes the ridiculous leg clipping of the winged animation. This mod has kept compatibility in mind, combat and kill move animations should still work perfectly.


[/size][/b][b][color=#00ff00][size=5][center]SEEING IS BELIEVING!!!
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/93384/93384-1535801746-208245069.jpeg[/img]﻿[/center][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#00ff00][size=5][center]Left side "Supreme Vampire Lords" VS. Right side vanilla!
 
DIRECT COMPARISONS!!!

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/93384/93384-1535801860-1572059336.jpeg[/img]﻿[/center][/size][/color][/b][center][b]﻿[/b][color=#00ff00][b][size=4]Left side Modded (No Wing leg clipping)[/size][size=5] VS.[/size][/b][size=4][b] Right side (wing disappearing into leg) vanilla wing animation
[/b][/size][/color][/center][color=#00ff00][size=4]


[b][center]A Terrifingly Spectacular image provided by the talented[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/11889623] clauDA [/url]﻿[/center]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/93384/93384-1535836423-1170401519.png[/img]﻿[/b][/size][/color][size=4]


[/size]
[color=#00ffff][size=6][b][center][ [ [ MOD COMPATIBILITY] ] ] [/center]
[/b][/size][/color]
[center][size=5][color=#fff2cc][b]Supreme Vampire Lords replaces the vanilla skeleton of the Vampire Lord and will overwrite any mod that makes changes to the vanilla Vampire Lord skeleton.  Mods that make sweeping changes to vanilla skeletons e.g."Realistic Ragdoll and Force" [/b][b]should be compatible as long as "Supreme Vampire Lords" is installed after those mods and allowed to overwrite their files.[/b][/color]

[b][color=#fff2cc]Should be fully compatible with any texture or new mesh mods, since this mod contains no textures of it's own only a skeleton.  Which also makes it compatible with most other Vampire Lord mods that do not edit the vanilla Vampire Lord skeleton.[/color][/b][/size][size=5][b]
[color=#fff2cc]Should also be compatible with creature mods that use the vanilla Vampire Lord Skeleton such as [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913?tab=files]Immersive Creatures[/url]﻿.[/color][/b][/size][/center][size=5][b]

[/b][/size][b][size=5][center][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29085]Grimoas Vampire Lord﻿[/url]﻿ [color=#00ff00]- Compatible

[/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22565]Royal Bloodline - Vampire Lord Perk Tree - Abilities - And More[/url]﻿ [color=#00ff00]- Compatible[/color][/center][color=#00ff00]
[/color][/size]

[/b]
[b][b][color=#00ffff][size=6][center][ [ [ INSTALLATION ] ] ][/center][/size][/color][/b][color=#00ff00]

[/color][center][size=5][b]Recommend using Nexus Mod Manager or your favorite mod manager.

[/b][/size][b][size=5][color=#fce5cd]Install my mod[/color][color=#ffff00][u] after[/u] [/color][color=#fce5cd]any mod that makes changes to the vanilla Vampire Lord and[/color][color=#ff7700] [/color][color=#ffff00][u]click "Yes to all"[/u][/color][color=#fce5cd] [/color][u][color=#ffff00]when prompted to overwrite any files[/color][/u][color=#fce5cd].[/color]
[/size][color=#fce5cd][size=5]There is no ".esp" plugin with this mod.[/size][/color][/b][/center][b][color=#fce5cd][size=5]


[/size][/color][/b][/b][center][color=#00ffff][b][b][size=6][ [ [ Spe[/size][/b][/b][b][b][size=6]cial Thanks ] ] ][/size]

[/b][/b][/color][b][size=5][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/4423548?tab=about+me]Felankhor[/url]﻿, for inspiring me to make this mod![/size][/b][/center][b][b][color=#fce5cd][size=5]

[/size][/color][/b]
[center][b][b][color=#00ffff][size=6][ [ [ MY OTHER MODS] ] ]
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#fce5cd][size=5]
[/size][/color][/b][/b][b][color=#00ffff][size=6][b][size=5]If you like this mod then I'm sure you'll enjoy my other mods. 
[/size][/b][/size][/color][/b][/center][b][color=#00ffff][size=6][b][size=5]

[/size][/b][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90000]SAVAGE BEAR [/url][size=5]﻿by [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/20882614][size=4]Rougeshot[/size][/url][/center][/size][/color][/b][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/90000/90000-1521074778-678009436.jpeg[/img]

author: Rougeshot
